page.title: 01GAZETEER PAGE
page.content: The area which we are covering mainly is farmland which has drains across it.The eastern side of our map has got quite a number of farms.Our squares have got the village of{Eye}and parts of{Dogsthorpe}and{Newark estates}of Peterborough. There are also a number of industrial pits like sand,gravel and clay pits which are now disused. There are many factories especially down Oxney road industrial estate. Recreation grounds are common around {Dogsthorpe,Eye}and{Newark estates consisting of playing facilities or just a grassy field with sometimes football or rugby pitches marked out. The main roads around our squares now is{Paston Parkway}and the{A47}which runs alongside{Eye.}The Council have signed a contract to build more Parkways in the near future.We have the acient Roman canal called{Cardyke.
